title: Real-Time Health Alert Notifications
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to implement a webhook system for real-time health alert notifications so that caregivers can receive timely updates about elderly users' well-being and respond quickly to urgent care events.

title: Comprehensive Developer Documentation – Step-by-Step Integration Guides
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want clear and comprehensive documentation with step-by-step integration guides so that I can easily build secure and user-friendly healthcare applications that cater to elderly users and their caregivers.

title: Security and Privacy Controls – OAuth-Based Authentication for Third-Party Apps
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to implement OAuth-based authentication for third-party applications so that I can ensure secure interactions and compliance with healthcare regulations while integrating new services for elderly users and caregivers.

title: API Feedback Mechanism
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want a feedback mechanism for the ALFRED APIs so that I can quickly address integration challenges and ensure compliance with healthcare regulations.

title: Modular Extension Architecture
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want a plugin-based system for adding new features to ALFRED so that I can create modular, customizable healthcare applications that effectively bridge the gap between elderly users and their caregivers.

title: Error Tracking and Reporting Interfaces
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want robust error tracking and reporting interfaces within the ALFRED system so that I can quickly identify and resolve issues in my healthcare applications, ensuring they remain secure and compliant with regulations.

title: Interoperability with Health Devices
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want to seamlessly integrate third-party health monitoring devices with ALFRED through pre-built connectors, so that I can ensure timely notifications for urgent care events and improve the quality of life for elderly users.
